article_title: 11.29.14: The Province’s BC High School Football Report, Subway Bowl 2014 semifinal edition

article_metadata.keywords: football, ballenas whalers, bc high school football, howard tsumura, john barsby bulldogs, mission roadrunners, mt. douglas rams, south delta sun devils, st. thomas more knights, subway bowl 2014, terry fox ravens, vernon panthers
article_metadata.description: An exciting day of Subway Bowl semifinal games is now over, with a shocker capping the night out here at UBC. SEMIFINALS TRIPLE A NO. 4 SOUTH DELTA 16 NO. 1 TERRY FOX 13 VANCOUVER — The sun rose at 11:08 p.m. Saturday night for the South Delta Sun Devils.
